title: The Great Flamarion (restored) (1945, film-noir, imdb score: 6.5)

sources.title: The Great Flamarion (restored) (1945, film-noir, imdb score: 6.5)
sources.description: The Great Flamarion is a 1945 film noir mystery film directed by Anthony Mann starring Erich von Stroheim and Mary Beth Hughes . The film, like many films noir, is shot in flashback narrative. The film was produced by Republic Pictures .
